metadata.description: Name of the existing VM to apply LAD extension to
Username for the Virtual Machine. Default value is localadmin
Password for the Virtual Machine. Default value is 'Subscription#<subscription id>'
Maps to the publisher in the Azure Stack Platform Image Repository manifest file Eg: Canonical, Suse, OpenLogic
Maps to the Offer in the Azure Stack Platform Image Repository manifest file Eg: UbuntuServer, SlesServer, CentOS
Maps to the sku in the Azure Stack Platform Image Repository manifest file Eg: 12.SP1, 6.7 , 7.2
The size of the Virtual Machine.
The name of an existing storage account to which diagnostics data will be transferred.
The sastoken for storage account, existingdiagnosticsStorageAccountName.
